00056 class KVIRC_API KviKvsTimer
00057 {
00058         friend class KviKvsTimerManager;
00059 public:
00060         enum Lifetime { SingleShot, WindowLifetime, Persistent };
00061 protected:
00062         KviKvsTimer(const QString &szName,Lifetime l,KviWindow * pWnd,int iDelay,int iId,KviKvsScript * pCallback,KviKvsVariantList * pParams);
00063 public:
00064         ~KviKvsTimer();
00065 protected:
00066         Lifetime                    m_eLifetime;        // the type of this timer
00067         KviWindow                 * m_pWnd;             // the window that this timer is (currently) bound to
00068         QString                     m_szName;           // this timer name
00069         KviKvsScript              * m_pCallback;        // callback to be executed at timer shots
00070         int                         m_iDelay;           // the timer delay in msecs
00071         int                         m_iId;              // the system id of this timer
00072         KviKvsExtendedRunTimeData * m_pRunTimeData;     // ext run time data for this timer object
00073         KviKvsVariantList         * m_pParameterList;   // parameter list
00074 public:
00075         KviWindow * window(){ return m_pWnd; };
00076         const QString & name(){ return m_szName; };
00077         const KviKvsScript * callback(){ return m_pCallback; };
00078         Lifetime lifetime(){ return m_eLifetime; };
00079         int delay(){ return m_iDelay; };
00080         int id(){ return m_iId; };
00081         //KviKvsHash * variables(){ return m_pVariables; };
00082         KviKvsExtendedRunTimeData * runTimeData(){ return m_pRunTimeData; };
00083         KviKvsVariantList * parameterList(){ return m_pParameterList; };
00084 protected:
00085         void setWindow(KviWindow * pWnd){ m_pWnd = pWnd; };
00086 };
00087 
00088 
00089 class KVIRC_API KviKvsTimerManager : public QObject
00090 {
00091         Q_OBJECT
00092 protected: // it only can be created and destroyed by KviKvsTimerManager::init()/done()
00093         KviKvsTimerManager();
00094         ~KviKvsTimerManager();
00095 private:
00096         KviPointerHashTable<int,KviKvsTimer>     * m_pTimerDictById;      // stored by id
00097         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviKvsTimer>        * m_pTimerDictByName;    // stored by name
00098         static KviKvsTimerManager   * m_pInstance;             // the one and only timer manager instance
00099         KviPointerList<KviKvsTimer>     * m_pKilledTimerList;      // list of timers for that killing has been scheduled
00100         int                           m_iAssassinTimer;        // assassin timer id
00101         int                           m_iCurrentTimer;         // the timer currently executed
00102 public:
00103         static KviKvsTimerManager * instance(){ return m_pInstance; };
00104         static void init();
00105         static void done();
00106         // the pCallback and pParams are owned by the timer: they WILL be deleted
00107         bool addTimer(const QString &szName,KviKvsTimer::Lifetime l,KviWindow * pWnd,int iDelay,KviKvsScript * pCallback,KviKvsVariantList * pParams);
00108         bool deleteTimer(const QString &szName);
00109         bool deleteTimer(int iId);
00110         // the timer manager does not trigger timers concurrently
00111         // this means that if this is called from a timer handler
00112         // the current timer will be unique
00113         bool deleteCurrentTimer();
00114         void deleteAllTimers();
00115         bool timerExists(const QString &szName){ return m_pTimerDictByName->find(szName); };
00116         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviKvsTimer> * timerDict()
00117                 { return m_pTimerDictByName; };
00118 protected:
00119         void scheduleKill(KviKvsTimer * t);
00120         virtual void timerEvent(QTimerEvent *e);
00121 };
